column2: You think you can stop me? Not even the IRS can defeat the greatest power of all!
What? No! The Power of Friendship!
What did you do? I feel my power has been diminished.
I audited your friendships. They didn’t pass.
How dare you! I will destroy you!
Nani? My Power of Frienship… it’s gone.
You shouldn’t have cheated on your taxes.
This is low, even for your kind.
Then you do not know my kind very well.
